articles.author: Tereza Pultarova
articles.title: A simple streetlight hack could protect astronomy from urban light pollution - Space.com
articles.description: The spread of light pollution is so fast that it offsets improvements achieved through advances in telescope technology.

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: NASA Hubble Space Telescope captures mesmerizing images of Cosmic Reef - HT Tech
articles.description: Hubble Space Telescope captures two images of clouds of cosmic dust and gas which are called red nebula NGC 2014 and NGC 2020.
articles.content: Yet again, NASA has mesmerized the world with its beautiful images of the space glories. The NASA Hubble space telescope is known for studying and capturing images of celestial objects that are prese… [+2098 chars]
